mapper.select: SELECT cns.SEG_ID, s.STABLE_ID AS sampleId, cns.chr as chr, cns.start as start, cns.end as end, cns.num_probes as numProbes, cns.segment_mean as segmentMean FROM copy_number_seg cns JOIN cancer_study cs ON cs.CANCER_STUDY_ID = cns.CANCER_STUDY_ID JOIN sample s ON s.INTERNAL_ID = cns.SAMPLE_ID WHERE cs.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER = #{studyId}
